text: The Japan women's national water polo team is the representative for Japan in international women's water polo. ==Results== ===Olympic Games=== *2020 – Qualified ===World Championship=== *Fukuoka 2001 — 11th place *Barcelona 2003 — 11th place *Kazan 2015 — 15th place *Budapest 2017 — 13th place *Gwangju 2019 — 13th place ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:Women's national water polo teams Category:Women's water polo in Japan
title: Japan women's national water polo team
